channel.comment: Payload computer status. 0x00 - Good Picture overflow - 9 ID bits indicate picture index 0x10 - 75% full 0x11 - 85% full 0x12 - 90% full 0x13 - 95% full Memory overflow - 512 kB of memory 0x24 - 75% full 0x25 - 85% full 0x26 - 90% full 0x27 - 95% full Mode - What mode the PcMgr is in, hopefully the same as system mode 0x80 - Normal mode 0xC0 - Safe mode 0x40 - Detumble mode
